methods.boolean getFeature(String name): Look up the value of a feature flag.
methods.Object getProperty(String name): Look up the value of a property.
methods.void parse(String systemId): Parse an XML document from a system identifier (URI).
methods.void setContentHandler(ContentHandler ha: Allow an application to register a content event handler.
methods.void setDTDHandler(DTDHandler handler): Allow an application to register a DTD event handler.
methods.void setEntityResolver(EntityResolver re: Allow an application to register an entity resolver.
methods.void setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler handle: Allow an application to register an error event handler.
methods.void setFeature(String name, boolean val: Set the value of a feature flag.
methods.void setProperty(String name, Object val: Set the value of a property.
